bib_record.title: The backward angle scattering of 50 MeV protons from C, O, N and be.

free_txt: system, consisting of two 10.2 cm long scintillation
counters which are operated in coincidence.
The particle identification is achieved by the use of
a 0.1 cm thick passing counter made from Ne102
.The energy is determined by an analogue pulse
At polarization measurements the Faraday cup was
replaced by a split-plate ion chamber.
No analysis for elastic scattering is present.
